channel.title: Few Edits
channel.description:
How do I edit the text that shows when a player logs in and out on the friends list text.. right now I fixed the normal send text but the friends list still says the player logged in when they logout. :S
Also, how do I edit the worlds it says in friends list to say if they are online or offline instead of world 1 and world 8.... :S
If you can help please post, thanks a lot! I am using silabs webclient if that helps any.. :cool:
